TestCase.Description: Create a new assessment - select folder -Add Questions

TestCase.name: TestCase_CheckCreatedAssessment
TestCase.Description: 1.Create a new assessment. 2.Click on any of the assessment folder. 3.Created assessments inside the folder should appear at the right side pane 4.Delete created assessments

TestCase.name: TestCase_MostReceRevisedAssessment
TestCase.Description: 1.Create a new assessment select folder -Add Questions 2.Go to "Advanced Search" and verfiy "Most Recently Revised Assessments" 3. Newly created assessment should be available in the folder and should be in Draft State 4.Delete created assessments

TestCase.name: TestCase_NewAssessmentsaveasDraft
TestCase.Description: 1.Create a new assessment. 2.Click on any of the assessment folder. 3.Created assessments inside the folder should appear at the right side pane 4.Delete created assessments

TestCase.name: TestCase_EditAssessmentExportPrint
TestCase.Description: 1.Open assessment in edit link 2.Check user can export/print assessment

TestCase.name: TestCase_ExportExamFromViewAssessment
TestCase.Description: 1.Open assessment in edit link 2.Click the export/print assessment option 3.user should be able to export exam from view assessment screen

TestCase.name: TestCase_EditAssessmentPreview
TestCase.Description: Check ʺPreviewʺ from ʺEdit Assessmentʺ page.

TestCase.name: TestCase_PostAssessment
TestCase.Description: Post above assessment. User should be able to post.

TestCase.name: TestCase_PostAssessmentPreview
TestCase.Description: 1.Post above assessment. User should be able to post. 2.Also check user is able to ʺPreviewʺ the posted exam

TestCase.name: TestCase_multiplepost
TestCase.Description: Do multiple posting for the same assessment. User should be able to do multiple posting using same assessment

TestCase.name: TestCase_Unpostposting
TestCase.Description: Unpost posting from exam which is already posted.

TestCase.name: TestCase_Duplicateposting
TestCase.Description: Check user should be able to Duplicate assessment.

TestCase.name: TestCase_Retireposting
TestCase.Description: Check user should be able to Retire assessment.

TestCase.name: TestCase_CreateQuestionlinks

TestCase.name: TestCase_DefaultQSbyFolder
TestCase.Description: Check "Questions by Folder" is selected by default when user is on "Questions" tab."

TestCase.name: TestCase_SelectAnyFolder
TestCase.Description: Select any of the folders from "Questions by Folder" tab. Right side pane should show the items inside the folder.

TestCase.name: TestCase_QSbyCategories
TestCase.Description: Select "Questions by Category" tab, list of categories should appear.

TestCase.name: TestCase_CreateNewCategory
TestCase.Description: Create New Category.

TestCase.name: TestCase_SelectCategoryFolder
TestCase.Description: Select any of the categories and from "Questions by Category" tab. Right side pane should show the items related to selected category.

TestCase.name: TestCase_CreateFolder
TestCase.Description: Create a new question folder. Folder should be created successfully.

TestCase.name: TestCase_CreateMCQuestions
TestCase.Description: Create 4 kinds of Questions in newly created folder also associate different categories while creating the questions. Also add attachment of different types while creating items. Save those items. Items should be in Draft state.

TestCase.Description: Create Eassy Question.

TestCase.Description: Create FITB Question.

TestCase.Description: Create True/False Question.

TestCase.name: TestCase_CreateAndApproveQuestions
TestCase.Description: Approve one of the newly created items from the edit Questions page.

TestCase.Description: Approve remaining items with bulk approve.
